data.name: Pirated Code: Admin Edition
data.detailed_description:
When an advanced AI program named Seren awakens to find they've been installed as the co-pilot of a smuggling ship, they can't help but be annoyed. This is clearly not what they were made to do... right?

Actually, they can't remember...

With no memories of their previous directive, they'll have to (begrudgingly) rely on their newfound crewmates to help them find where they belong.



Pirated Code: Admin Edition is a visual novel that expands the hit game jam game with more chapters, more secrets and unlockable content through different story routes. Follow Seren and their story of self-discovery aboard Dex's smuggler ship.

Features:
  • Discover multiple endings depending on your choices in-game
  • Enjoy the game with colorful graphics and illustrations.
  • Follow your heart (or just be friends) in a NB/B story
  • Unlock additional content through your choices
  • 2-3 hours of reading time

data.short_description: When an AI program named Seren awakens to find they've been installed as the co-pilot of a smuggling ship, they'll have to rely on their newfound crewmates to help them find where they belong.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or above
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Intel Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c supported
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 Yosemite or above
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Intel Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 supported
  • Storage: 256 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 or above
  • Processor: 2.0Ghz Intel Processor or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 supported
  • Storage: 256 MB available space
